author: James Hibberd
title: Trump asked if he'd pardon Joe Exotic during coronavirus press briefing
description: The president promises he'll "take a look" at the Tiger King star's case.
content:
A reporter asked President Trump if he'd considered pardoning imprisoned Tiger King star Joe Exotic at a press conference about the pandemic Wednesday.
The president was giving one of his daily press briefing about the U.S. coronavirus response at the White … [+2766 chars]
